job_description:
Magento Developer

KENLAND IT SOLUTIONS (P) Ltd 3rd & 5th FLOORS, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA, 695581 https://www.kenland.in

Closing Date: 30, Sept 2025 Job Published: 30, Aug 2025 Contact Email: recruiter@kenland.in

We are seeking a skilled PHP Laravel Magento Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in PHP, Laravel, and Magento, with a strong background in developing and maintaining web applications and eCommerce platforms. You will work on building high-performance, scalable solutions while ensuring security, reliability, and maintainability. Immediate joiners preferred.

Key Responsibilities:

Magento Development:

  • Develop and customize Magento themes and extensions.
  • Configure and maintain Magento e-commerce websites.
  • Implement new features and functionalities based on business requirements.

Backend Development:

  • Build and maintain PHP-based applications.
  • Optimize application performance and database queries.
  • Integrate third-party APIs and services with Magento.

Code Quality:

  • Write clean, scalable, and well-documented code.
  • Conduct code reviews and optimize legacy code.

Collaboration:

  • Work closely with UI/UX designers, front-end developers, and stakeholders.
  • Provide technical solutions and recommendations.

Testing and Maintenance:

  • Perform unit and integration testing.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in a timely manner.

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • Proven experience as a Magento Developer (Magento 3yrs preferred).
  • Strong knowledge of PHP, MySQL, and OOP principles.
  • Experience with front-end technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery).
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • Knowledge of Magento's architecture, coding standards, and security best practices.
  • Experience in integrating payment gateways, shipping methods, and third-party APIs.
  • Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.

Preferred Skills

  • Magento Certification (Developer or Solution Specialist).
  • Knowledge of frameworks like Laravel or Symfony.
  • Experience with Docker, Jenkins, or other CI/CD tools.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.
summary: Seeking a skilled PHP Laravel Magento Developer to develop and maintain web applications and eCommerce platforms. The role involves building high-performance, scalable solutions.

job_description:
BIM Modeler

GRID Engineering Services is seeking a skilled BIM Modeler to join our team in Trivandrum. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in BIM, with experience working on a variety of international projects.

Location: Technopark, Trivandrum Salary: Between 25,000 to 60,000 INR (Based on skills and experience)

Key Responsibilities:

  • Creating detailed construction drawings.
  • Developing 3D models.
  • Collaborating with architects and engineers to ensure project accuracy and efficiency.
  • 3D Model Creation: Prior experience and expertise in creating ID architectural models.
  • Drafting drawings in collaboration with structural and architectural projects.
  • Translating architectural / Structural drawings and concepts into precise digital models.
  • Coordinating with the interdisciplinary BIM process and clash detection.
  • Extracting plans and detailed drawings.
  • Updating and revising models based on design changes and feedback.
  • Ensuring model accuracy and consistency throughout the project lifecycle.
  • Working closely with architects, engineers, and other project team members.
  • Coordinating with other disciplines (structural, MEP) to ensure model compatibility.
  • Participating in BIM coordination meetings.
  • Generating construction documents, drawings, and schedules from the BIM model.
  • Producing detailed shop drawings for fabrication and construction.
  • Adhering to BIM standards and protocols.
  • Implementing and maintaining BIM execution plans.
  • Ensuring model quality control.
  • Managing and organizing BIM data.
  • Extracting data for quantity take-offs, cost estimation, and other analyses.
  • Identifying and resolving modeling conflicts and clashes.
  • Troubleshooting technical issues related to Revit software.

Qualifications:

  • BE/BTech/ Diploma in Civil Engineering
  • 4+ years’ work experience in Architectural/Structural BIM Modelling
  • Excellent is Architectural ID Drawings
  • Proficiency in BIM Software
  • Skilled in family creation, extracting plans & other documentation
  • Efficiency in 3D Modelling and Clash checking
  • Ability to handle rendering & visualization tools
  • Strong communication and teamwork skills
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment
  • Skilled in Dynamo development is an added advantage.

Preferred Skills:

  • Developing and managing 3D Architectural & Structural models using Revit.
  • Exceptional understanding of BIM processes.
  • Basic knowledge of rendering and visualization tools (Lumion, Enscape, Twinmotion).
  • Thorough understanding of formulas to drive parametric values and to create parametric families.
  • Strong interpersonal skills to collaborate and coordinate with project stakeholders.

Contact Information: Email: hr@grdeng.com Website: https://gridengineeringservices.com Address: Nila, Technopark Phase I, Technopark Rd, Technopark Campus, 695581

Closing Date: 30, Sept 2025 Job Published: 30, Aug 2025
summary: GRID Engineering Services is hiring a BIM Modeler with 4+ years of experience. The role involves creating 3D models, construction drawings, and collaborating with project teams.

job_description:
Structural Engineer/ Checker

Grid Engineering Services Nila, Technopark Phase I, Technopark Rd, Technopark Campus, 695581 https://gridengineeringservices.com

Closing Date: 30, Sept 2025 Job Published: 30, Aug 2025 Contact Email: hr@grdeng.com

Brief Description: The Structural Engineer/ Checker will lead and oversee the rebar detailing team, ensuring accurate, efficient, and timely production of rebar shop drawings and schedules. This role requires a deep understanding of rebar detailing practices, industry standards, and project requirements, coupled with the ability to check the drawings, optimize workflows, manage team and deliver high-quality drawings.

Responsibilities: - Review and approve shop drawings and schedules for accuracy, completeness, and compliance with project specifications. - Assign tasks, set performance expectations and supervise the rebar detailing team. - Stay updated on the latest industry standards and technologies related to rebar detailing. - Monitor project progress and ensure timely delivery of shop drawings and schedules. - Communicate effectively with clients to understand their requirements and address their concerns.

Qualifications: - BE/BTech in Civil Engineering. - Minimum of 3-5 years of experience as a structural engineer expertized in shop drawing checking. - Strong understanding of rebar detailing codes and standards. - Proficiency in rebar detailing software (e.g., AutoCAD, CADS RC, ZW CAD, Rebar CAD etc). - Excellent communication in English and interpersonal skills. - Possess a strong understanding of rebar detailing standards and procedures to meet the quality.

Location: Technopark, Trivandrum

Salary: Between 25,000 to 60,000(Based on skills and experience).
summary: Lead the rebar detailing team as a Structural Engineer/Checker, ensuring accurate and timely production of shop drawings. Requires expertise in rebar detailing, relevant software, and strong communication.

job_description:
Bilagos Softwares (P) Ltd - Senior Full Stack Developer (.NET, Angular)

We are seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Full Stack Developer with a strong background in .NET (C#, ASP.NET Core) and Angular to join our growing development team.

Location: Trivandrum Experience: 7-10 years

Contact Email: hr@bilagos.in

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain robust, scalable web applications using .NET and Angular.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, QA, and product managers.
  • Develop RESTful APIs and integrate third-party services.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
  • Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging.
  • Optimize applications for maximum performance and scalability.
  • Maintain and improve existing codebases and peer review code changes.
  • Ensure security and data protection in applications.

  • 7+ years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer.
  • Strong experience with .NET Core / ASP.NET MVC / Web API.
  • Proficiency with Angular 15+ (or later versions), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
  • Experience with Entity Framework or other ORM tools.
  • Good understanding of SQL Server and writing complex queries/stored procedures.
  • Familiarity with RESTful API development and integration.
  • Knowledge of Git or other version control systems.
  • Strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Additional Details:

  • The ideal candidate will be able to work directly with the Norwegian team.

job_description:
R&D Manager – Software Development

Bilagos Softwares (P) Ltd is seeking an experienced and motivated R&D Manager to lead and grow a high-performing software development team. This role is central to realizing our product strategy and advancing our technological ambitions. As R&D Manager, you will ensure effective execution of development initiatives, foster a strong engineering culture, and drive cross-functional collaboration across the company.

Location: Trivandrum Experience: 9 to 12 years Department: Research & Development Closing Date: 13, Oct 2025 Job Published: 29, Aug 2025

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead and manage a team of software developers, ensuring alignment with company goals and product strategy.
  • Build and maintain an inclusive, high-performing development team through mentoring, skills development, and performance management.
  • Oversee the execution of software development projects, ensuring on-time delivery and adherence to project timelines.
  • Facilitate agile practices, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
  • Drive continuous improvement through adoption of DevOps practices and agile methodologies.
  • Collaborate closely with Product, Design, and other departments to ensure seamless integration of R&D efforts into the broader organization.
  • Monitor key R&D metrics and adjust plans to meet strategic goals.
  • Promote a culture of innovation, accountability, and collaboration.

Educational Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related technical field.

Preferred Skills:

  • Minimum 9 years of experience in software development, with at least 2 years in a leadership or managerial role.
  • Strong understanding of R&D processes and software development life cycles, preferably in a DevOps or agile environment.
  • Preferred experience in .Net along with hands-on experience in Microsoft/Azure.
  • Proven expertise in managing end-to-end R&D processes and a deep understanding of software development life cycles.
  • Strong project management skills with a focus on delivering quality outcomes on time.
  • Excellent communication skills in English and a proactive attitude.

Additional Details:

  • The ideal candidate will be able to work directly with the Norwegian team.
  • We are looking for immediate joiners or candidates with a notice period of less than 30 days.
  • Interested candidates should send their resumes to hr@bilagos.in with the subject line "R&D Manager - Software Development ".
  • Visit https://semine.com/en/ for more details.

Contact Email: hr@bilagos.in

job_description:
Graphic Designer

Techstas Info Solutions (P) Ltd is seeking a dynamic and detail-oriented Graphic Designer to join our creative team. We merge technology and creativity to deliver compelling visual experiences. This role is perfect for someone who excels in visual storytelling, has a strong grasp of motion graphics, and stays ahead of the curve with the latest design and AI tools.

  • Design and produce high-quality visual content across digital and print platforms.
  • Edit and enhance videos with compelling motion graphics and animations.
  • Create eye-catching posters, thumbnails, and other visual materials that align with brand guidelines.
  • Utilize AI-powered design tools to optimize workflows and improve creative output.
  • Stay updated on the latest design trends, tools, and best practices.
  • Collaborate with marketing, development, and product teams to meet project goals and deadlines.

Preferred Skills/Requirements:

  • 4+ years of professional experience in graphic design, motion graphics, or a related field.
  • Strong proficiency in design and editing software including:
  • Adobe Creative Cloud (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere Pro, etc.)
  • AI-powered tools (Adobe Sensei, Canva, etc.)
  • Other tools such as Figma, Sketch, or equivalents.
  • Familiarity with project management tools such as Zoho, Asana, or Jira.
  • Deep understanding of design principles, typography, and color theory.
  • Excellent creativity, problem-solving abilities, and attention to detail.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects and work both independently and in a team setting.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should send their resume and portfolio to career@techstas.com, with the Subject Line: Graphic Designer. Applications without the correct subject line may be delayed or rejected.

  • Company: Techstas Info Solutions (P) Ltd
  • Address: Module 9, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, 695581
  • Website: http://www.techstas.com
  • Contact Email: career@techstas.com

Important Dates:

  • Closing Date: 15, Sept 2025
  • Job Published: 29, Aug 2025

job_description:
Software Engineer (Full Stack - Web & Mobile)

Location: Technopark, Trivandrum (Full-time, Work from Office) Experience: 2 – 6 Years Employment Type: Permanent

Contact Email: vidhya.r@muthoot.com

About the Role

We are seeking talented and motivated Software Engineers with strong expertise in Angular, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and mobile app development (Android & iOS). The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web and mobile applications, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop, test, and deploy high-quality web and mobile applications.
  • Work on front-end development using Angular and ensure seamless user experience.
  • Build robust back-end services using Node.js with efficient database management in PostgreSQL.
  • Design, build, and maintain advanced applications for Android and iOS platforms.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Optimize applications for maximum performance, scalability, and reliability.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices in software development.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing applications.

Required Skills

  • Hands-on experience in Angular (latest versions).
  • Strong proficiency in Node.js and building RESTful APIs.
  • Experience working with PostgreSQL (queries, optimization, schema design).
  • Proficiency in Android (Java/Kotlin) and iOS (Swift/Objective-C) development.
  • Knowledge of version control systems (Git).
  • Solid understanding of software development lifecycle and agile methodologies.
  • Problem-solving skills with attention to detail.

Why Join Us

  • Exciting projects with cutting-edge technologies.
  • Opportunity to grow and work with a talented technical team.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Work-life balance with a permanent, stable role.

MUTHOOT PAPPACHAN TECHNOLOGIES LTD 14th FLOOR, CARNIVAL TECHNOPARK, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM P.O., TRIVANDRUM , 695581 https://www.mptglobal.com Closing Date: 20, Sept 2025 Job Published: 29, Aug 2025

job_description:

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd is seeking a Presales Specialist with 5 to 8 years of experience in IT presales. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication skills, experience in crafting proposals for IT organizations, strong organizational abilities, and the capacity to coordinate effectively with sales and practice teams.   • Manage the complete Bid Management Process in collaboration with the team.
  • Develop comprehensive proposals and capability decks from start to finish.
  • Deliver presentations and demonstrations to prospective and current clients.
  • Liaise with product/service development teams to gain in-depth knowledge and relay user behavior and client feedback.
  • Support the sales team in achieving targets.
  • Conduct industry research, including competitor and market analysis.
  • Identify potential new markets or clients based on product/service knowledge and user understanding.
  • Organize and lead kick-off and debrief meetings.
  • Serve as a point of contact for prospects.
  • Provide marketing support by creating case studies, white papers, etc.
  • Prepare estimations based on previous examples.
  • Utilize basic business analysis experience to prepare documents like BRD.
  • Apply basic technical knowledge to understand RFP/Requirements and suggest optimal technology choices.
  • Facilitate partner connections and collaboration.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills:

  • Ability to write high-quality proposals.
  • Leadership and communication skills.
  • Presentation skills.
  • Interest in and understanding of the technology industry.
  • Ability to research and stay current with industry developments.
  • Influencing and negotiation skills.
  • Aptitude for time management and organization.
  • Problem-solving ability.

Secondary Skills:

  • Basic technical knowledge and awareness of new trends.
  • Experience working with standard CRM systems.

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com, including their notice period, current, and expected CTC details.

job_description:
Delivery Manager

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 http://www.reflectionsglobal.com

Closing Date: 08, Sept 2025 Job Published: 29, Aug 2025 Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Brief Description: We are looking for candidates with 14+ years of experience for the Delivery Manager role.

Responsibilities:

Project Delivery Management: - Oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of multiple technical projects. - Manage project scope, timelines, budgets, risks, and quality. - Ensure adherence to Agile/Waterfall methodologies as per project requirements.

Team Leadership: - Lead and mentor cross-functional technical teams, fostering collaboration and innovation. - Conduct regular performance reviews and provide growth opportunities for team members.

Stakeholder Engagement: - Act as a bridge between technical teams, business stakeholders, and clients. - Communicate project status, risks, and solutions effectively to all stakeholders.

Technical Expertise: - Collaborate with architects and engineers to define technical solutions. - Provide input on architecture, design, and implementation strategies.

Process Improvement: - Identify opportunities to improve project delivery processes and tools. - Implement best practices in software development and delivery.

Risk and Issue Management: - Proactively identify project risks and develop mitigation strategies. - Resolve technical and operational challenges in a timely manner.

Customer Focus: - Ensure customer satisfaction by delivering high-quality solutions aligned with business needs.

Preferred Skills/Experience:

  • 14 years of experience in technology delivery roles, including hands-on development and leadership responsibilities.
  • Proven experience in delivering large-scale, complex projects with diverse teams.

Technical Expertise: - Strong understanding of modern software development practices, cloud technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP), and DevOps. - Proficiency in one or more programming languages (e.g., Java, Python, .NET) is preferred.

Project Management: - Expertise in Agile, Scrum, Kanban, and traditional project management methodologies. - Certification such as PMP, CSM, or equivalent is an advantage.

Leadership and Communication: - Excellent team leadership, people management, and conflict resolution skills. - Strong communication, presentation, and negotiation abilities.

Education: - Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master’s degree is a plus).

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Note: Reflections Info Systems does not ask for fees for job opportunities. Be cautious of fraudulent job offers. Contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for clarifications.
summary: Reflections Info Systems is seeking a Delivery Manager with 14+ years of experience. This role involves overseeing technical projects, leading teams, and engaging with stakeholders.

job_description:
Data Engineering - Project Manager

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd is seeking a highly experienced Data Engineering Project Manager to lead the end-to-end delivery of data platform, AI, BI, and analytics projects. The ideal candidate will possess 13+ years of overall IT experience with 6+ years in a Technical Product Manager, Technical Program Manager, or Delivery Lead role.

Responsibilities:

  • Own the end-to-end delivery of data platform, AI, BI, and analytics projects, ensuring alignment with business objectives and stakeholder expectations.
  • Develop and maintain comprehensive project plans, roadmaps, and timelines for data ingestion, transformation, governance, AI/ML models, and analytics deliverables.
  • Lead cross-functional teams including data engineers, data scientists, BI analysts, architects, and business stakeholders to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions on time and within budget.
  • Define, prioritize, and manage product and project backlogs covering data pipelines, data quality, governance, AI services, and BI dashboards or reporting tools.
  • Collaborate closely with business units to capture and translate requirements into actionable user stories and acceptance criteria for data and analytics solutions.
  • Oversee BI and analytics area including dashboard development, embedded analytics, self-service BI enablement, and ad hoc reporting capabilities.
  • Ensure data quality, lineage, security, and compliance requirements are integrated throughout the project lifecycle, in collaboration with governance and security teams.
  • Coordinate UAT, performance testing, and user training to ensure adoption and successful rollout of data and analytics products.
  • Act as the primary point of contact for all project stakeholders, providing regular status updates, managing risks and issues, and escalating as necessary.
  • Facilitate agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, backlog grooming, demos, and retrospectives, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.
  • Drive post-deployment monitoring and optimization of data and BI solutions to meet evolving business needs and performance standards.

Preferred Skills:

  • Overall 13+ Years of Experience in IT with 6+ years of experience as a Technical Product Manager, Technical Program Manager, or Delivery Lead.
  • Hands-on development experience in data engineering, including data pipelines, ETL processes, and data integration workflows
  • Proven track record managing data engineering, analytics, or AI/ML projects end to end
  • Solid understanding of modern data architecture: data lakes, warehouses, pipelines, ETL/ELT, governance, and AI tooling
  • Hands-on familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS, GCP) and DataOps/MLOps practices
  • Strong knowledge of Agile methodologies, sprint planning, and backlog grooming
  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, including working with senior execs and technical leads
  • Background in computer science, engineering, data science, or analytics
  • Experience or Solid Understanding with data engineering tools and services in AWS, Azure & GCP
  • Exposure or Solid Understanding of BI, Analytics, LLMs, RAG, prompt engineering, or agent-based AI systems
  • Experience leading cross-functional teams in matrixed environments
  • Certifications: PMP, CSM, SAFe, or equivalent are a plus

Contact Information:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

summary: Reflections Info Systems is hiring a Data Engineering Project Manager to lead data platform, AI, and BI projects. The role requires 13+ years of IT experience and expertise in data architecture and cloud platforms.

job_description:
Technical Project Manager (Application Development)

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd is seeking a highly experienced Technical Project Manager to lead the end-to-end execution of custom application development and integration projects. These projects are primarily built on .NET stacks with modern client frameworks and integration platforms. The ideal candidate will possess a strong technical foundation and project delivery expertise, capable of driving complex, cross-functional initiatives from discovery through production rollout.

This role requires hands-on experience across the full software/product development lifecycle, including planning, estimation, design, development, testing, and release, while working closely with engineering, product, and client stakeholders.

Responsibilities:

  • Manage end-to-end delivery of custom software development and integration projects using Java, .NET, and related technologies.
  • Create and maintain project plans, define timelines, identify dependencies, and track progress.
  • Coordinate with cross-functional teams including developers, QA, UI/UX, and DevOps to ensure smooth execution.
  • Oversee all stages of the SDLC: requirements finalization, development, integration, testing (unit, system, UAT, NFR), and deployment.
  • Work closely with architects and leads to ensure alignment with technical direction and design.
  • Identify and manage risks, scope changes, and schedule adjustments proactively.
  • Serve as the primary point of contact for clients and stakeholders, providing regular updates and resolving issues.
  • Ensure quality and timely delivery through effective team coordination and clear communication.

Preferred Skills:

Technical & Delivery Expertise

  • 13+ years of overall IT experience, with 4–6 years of Technical Project Management experience.
  • Strong understanding of custom application development on Java/.NET stacks.
  • Experience managing:
    • Backend/API development
    • Integration using tools like Apache Camel, IBM Integration Stack
    • Database interactions (Oracle, SQL Server)
    • Client-side development using React/Angular
    • Deployment on cloud platforms (AWS, Azure)
  • Familiarity with Microservices architecture, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices.

Project Management

  • Expertise in schedule planning, effort estimation, dependency tracking, and delivery monitoring.
  • Hands-on experience in scope and schedule change management, stakeholder communication, and issue escalation.
  • Tools: Jira, Confluence, MS Project, Git, Jenkins, or equivalent.

Secondary Skills

  • Experience managing globally distributed teams.
  • Strong understanding of enterprise-level integrations and technology ecosystems.

Soft Skills

  • Excellent communication and stakeholder engagement capabilities.
  • Strong leadership, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
  • Ability to articulate technical topics to both technical and non-technical audiences.

Contact Information:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Note: Reflections Info Systems does not charge any fees for job opportunities. Be cautious of fraudulent job offers and contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for any clarifications.

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India , 695581 http://www.reflectionsglobal.com
